projects.name: Image and text encryption application using Java
projects.description: Built android application that encrypts images, text files that can be sent in a encrypted text stream. Used base64 encoding method that is more efficient than existing encryption methods. Used AES algorithm for additional password-protection of the text/ byte stream.

projects.name: AWS resource Tracker using Shell Scripting
projects.description: Developed an AWS Resource Tracker using Shell Scripting. Utilized AWS CLI for seamless interaction with AWS services. Displays list of various AWS resources, including EC2 instances, S3 buckets, RDS databases, IAM users, and security groups.

projects.name: Advancing Indoor Localization Accuracy with CNN Approach
projects.description: Implemented CNN models for indoor localization, achieving sub-meter accuracy with a median error of 0.8m and 80% of predictions within 1.2m. Developed CNN architecture with three convolutional layers, 3x3 filters, and dropout techniques to prevent overfitting, ensuring robust model training. Demonstrated a validation accuracy of 94.6667%, underscoring the reliability and effectiveness of the developed CNN model for indoor localization tasks.

experiences.description: Implemented API calls to fetch live data from Google Trends and analyzed the data sets using pandas. Made reports on finding popularity of search terms based on region and time and analyzed them for fetching better results.

full_output.name: HARSHA VARDHAN KHANDAVILLI
achievements_and_awards: Gold medal for research presentation at 8th Research Day, 2024 conducted at SRM University, AP.
